comments.comment: Pewds is turning full on dad mode - sand paper hands, 3D printing, getting a family car… I love it! All the best for you and Marzia, you’ll be amazing parents!
So nice to hear Felix and Pewds have been able to live together for a whole year, I'm so proud of both of them
I actually can't believe a whole year passed since he moved, good on you Felix.

I dont watch pewds anymore really, just decided to check up on the recent uploads and I can't tell how happy I'm for him  and where he is at in life right now. Feels like seeing an old friend succeed in life and get to where he wants to be in life.
Im so happy for you and Marzia, im so proud that youre finally at a point where youre happy and settled in
Glad Mark is up for this and with absolutely no consulting at all
I turn 20 tomorrow, this is officially the last time I can watch PewDiePie as a nineteen year old. I am honoured that this video came out today.
Pewds is like that longtime friends you’ve known for years, no matter how long you spend time away from them the second you see them again it’s like no time has passed

Felix talking about his family visiting feels like we're a long time friend who met once in a while, asking each other how are they doing and going back to our own respective life. Then meet again once in awhile

Sometimes I’m like “I’ve seen so many Pewds videos, maybe I’ll skip this one” then I watch it later and I’m like “why the fu did I think I’d skip this, this is gold” the nostalgia mixed in with the haha funnies, mixed in with catching up on new things going on. It’s just nice to sorta be connected to the journey of such a entertaining guy. - Proud Uncle
As a looooong time Pewds fan, being promoted to an uncle made me almost tear up
Pewds is definitely not the same YouTuber I grew up watching but I’m just glad he’s happy
The way he said "we're having a boy and I'm so excited" is the cutest, purest thing I've seen on the internet  Ly pewds, you're going to be the best dad ️
9:51 "if you are not traumatizing your own kids for entertainment, whats the point" Felix becoming a dad just to troll his kid is golden, what a mad lad
Crazy that Felix gets a bad reputation from mainstream media but hes one of the few youtubers who can go to japan and not cause a shitstorm even when he lives there for a entire year.

Love you Pewds!! I went through some real tough times years back, and all your silliness, lightheartedness, laughter, advice, and all who you are was really wonderful to have in some of those really dark and hard times! Thank you and please keep us in the loop! Congratulations on the new baby on the way!! You and Marzia will be fun and wonderful parents! ️️

It's so good realizing pewds is doing videos cause he actually wants to do them, (not feeling like he's forced) you can tell he is genuinely so much happier and it shows. Through his smiles, stories, and moments. He's truly grown
12:00 yoooooo pewds knowing destroy lonely is soo cool, idc if likes his music or not but its still really cool
We can tell that Felix is quite happy in Japan. Well done for going for it through the hardships. Looks like it paid off for your family.  Congratulations on the boy!
My bro i haven't seen you in years and your intro was how i imagined it, love you dude it's a trip rembering your videos

The first time I watched a Pewdiepie video I was in 6th Grade, earlier this month I graduated college. Life comes at you fast, but Pewds has been there through all of it. Can't thank him enough for everything he's done.

i remember meeting Felix's Dad 8 years back. the guy is so nice! he is SUCH a massively kind gentleman.
and so is Felix as well. havent met him face to face in a LONG time, but i remember very well the times i did meet him. as long as you don't overwhelm the guy with the whole "fanboy/Fangirl" treatment, he will talk with you until he can't spare any more time. Miss you Felix! so happy to see you thriving and happy in Japan man!

Pews: "Mark Said Yes"
Mark: "It's all coming together"
lol if I were told Pew's comment area would be this warmhearted and joyful yeas ago, I would say you are insane. Good on you man!

As a father of a 2 year old little girl, I am so excited to see you go through the early stages of becoming a parent. I am so happy and excited for you to start this next chapter. Being a parent is indescribable and I cant wait for you and Marzia to experience it first hand.

I got recommended to watch pewds years ago and I never thought I'd actually enjoy his content. I watched a few videos over the course of the week and immediately fell into where I'm at. Through good and bad pewds been there to help me through it all. Thank you Felix
PewDiePie, thank you for always being there to make us smile.

13:20 "Mark said yes" 
Yep, that sounds like Mark
7:20 "Uncle fist"

13:30
"HE CAN'T KEEP GETTING AWAY WITH IT!!!'

I've been watching you since I was 13 (12 years) and you're still such a huge part of my life. Thanks for all the years of memories, the good and the bad, through all the growth. I am SO SO SO EXCITED for you and Marzia and your new journey together with your baby boy-- even more so than I was to have learned you and Marzia were getting married. Sending love and thanks to you both!

So that's why he moved to Japan. So he could be taller then everyone else


So happy your doing lwiay again, love it

11:04  "having a boy and i'm so excited"
i could cry, life really can be beautiful. so happy for the two (three) of you!
I never stopped loving you, Pewds. Your daft face, annoying laugh and immature humor got me through difficult times, and you'll always be No. 1 to me.
Pewds showing us a picture of his dad from his visit on his phone like we’re actually there instead of just editing it in is so wholesome
0:19 LWIAY INTRO
Felix is just too wholesome... we must protect this man at all costs!
A 1 year anniversary? Dang time flies. Pewds out here living his best life

So I've been watching this channel since I was 13 (now 25) and I can say I am now working at IKEA and it's the happiest job I've ever had. Seeing "Hej!" on the back of my work shirt is so comforting. Guess the Swedish-ness found it's way into my daily life besides just PewDiePie videos. Thanks for inspiring me all these years!
8:53 With the amount of content pewds has uploaded over the years you can make a data base feed it to an ai and have it generate an example for every human trait / character possible.
Even though I knew they're having a boy through the hints, hearing Felix actually confirm it made me so happy. They're gonna be great parents
11:03 felt so hard, seeing everything moving forward and its kinda bittersweet its an exciting development but you cant help but look back at the old times where problems were less
I like your intro so much.

I do miss some of the content ngl.
But seeing Pewds so happy and content is truly what he deserves.
Keep it up, my man ️
As someone who just moved far away from my hometown into a completely different culture, I know what it’s like to leave everything and start over. Congratulations on 1 year in Japan!

me having not watched pewdiepie in awhile and coming back to him being still as funny as ever
classic pewdiepie
8:23 when you escaped the west but your friend was left behind
Love you pewds! Congrats on your one year Japanniversary!! I can’t wait for the videos to come, and I think it’s really awesome that you set up that livestream for us to interact with one another!
2:25 I was gonna say NordVPN, but I was disappointed when it wasn't. Thankfully, Pewds came in clutch at the end
So after one year, what’s something you wish you had done differently with the move? Either in preparation or once arriving. Hope you’re having a great adventure Pewds!
congratulations to every uncle out there
9:19 best family car felix, mazda cx-5, still fun to drive too, and the most important thing is the safety rating is high, based on testing.
9:01 i always loved that shirt man , it's legendary

Congratulations on your growing family! ️ Been following u since the start and genuinely miss Marzia’s videos- I’m glad she contributes to your vlogs also, it seems like quitting YouTube was good for her! You both seem SO happy and at peace and I’ve just had a baby and bought a house with my own partner, who also watched ur vids since before we’d even met. You’re a lot more important and mean a lot more than you realize! Glad to see you’re uploading whenever and whatever you want, keep it up! Hope you’ll maybe do some baby vlogging in whatever fashion u see fit. 
Btw!!
I told my mom that “that guy on YouTube that screamed a lot” (because when I lived at home in ur Amnesia days that’s all she knew of you), that you were having a baby and moved to Japan, and she was really happy for you and wanted me to tell you
13:20 You know what you have to do :}

Been watching you for 10 years, and I can still say you are my favorite channel, seeing you grow from the loud but nervous swede to the humble, funny and charming japa-swede has been amazing. Through the ups and downs you continued to prevail and I can't wait to see what the future holds for you and your family. Much love Felix, brofist
So happy to see Felix and Marzia continuing to grow! And I can’t believe it’s been a year already that’s insane
13:02 I can't believe my first post on the subreddit got into a PewDiePie video. Holy crap. How was my cringe recognized?
That was very nice of Jimmy. It's always Fun seeing Jimmy & Pewds together
What an amazing first year in Japan! I'm so happy for you Pewds! Great classic, funny video!! Can't wait for the next one!

It's crazy that you have been such an important part of my life since I was 14 and now i'm a grown bro. So happy to see that you're having a kid! Wishing you well.
Also, I have been watching old videos of you and your opinions about kids and I'm giggling knowing that you are about to be a dad, now. It's so funny.
12:06 Pewdiepie is opium
I smile every time he uploads a video. Miss you so much Felix! Hope you and Marzia are just as happy
11:55 they still using that damn picture !!!
So this is the last lwiay guys
I’m so happy for you two. Incredible human beings creating another one. What a time to be alive.

Honestly, I've been feeling pretty down recently since I am about to graduate Highschool and am afraid of what my life will be afterward. I am scared that adult life will be a giant mess for me and that all the good time I could have had is now over. Thankfully, when I needed something good and happy to lift me up once more, Pewdiepie uploads. I'm so happy that throughout my life and time  I've spent, I have been able to see and experience this awesome dude on the internet. As always, I hope to see more of Pewd's in my life to come, Felix, thank you for existing.
11:25 omg it's Rasputin
Get a Volvo 240 GL as a family car. The engine, B230F will NEVER in a million years cause you any trouble at all. Also it was very popular amongst families when it came out.

This video was great! Super wholesome and made me laugh many times. I'm really happy that Felix got a lot of great stuff going on now and i hope he has a great time in Japan with Marzia and soon little bebbe!

10:29
What if he knew something we didn't at the time, he seemed so sure of it too.
You were literally having your future told without even realizing it.

I started watching PewDiePie in 2017. And God daymn. Time flies. And it's been a year since pewds moved to Japan. Your daily videos used to be my routine. But i am happy for you, having a boy, experiencing new adventures.
The meme that never dies is the falling pipe sound effect
These videos still put a smile on my face. Felix's humour is just right up my alley no matter how many years has passed.

Congrats Pewds on 1 year Japanniversary! More great videos to come!

At this point pewds is the adult I want to see times to times to know how he is going. Love ya man, you are part if my entire childhood.
Glad to see you are putting out vids to update us on your amazing journey
Just knowing Jimmy was going to stand t the bottom of the hill is so sweet honestly. And knowing you proposed it is hilarious
I really love how calm and genuinly happy you seem in your latest videos. I hope Marzia and the lil one are as happy and healthy as they can ️.
pewdiepie is like this one old friend u look for when u want to chill and laugh and have a peace of mind
Man I missed LWIAY, thank you for bringing it back felix!!
Jimmy and Felix combined are like gods.
pewd video is always heartwarming. when he showed his photo wis his dad, it feels very personal.

Japan is so lucky to have Pewds and Marzia starting a family there too! 
Love you guys so much Pewds. 
I watch my family grow up while watching you and I’m so excited to now watch your family grow too. 

We are a Pewdiepie Family for life lol  

Much love to you Pewds
